mapper.select: select a.smem_no, b.mem_name, c.col_code, a.stu_joinyear, c.dep_code, c.dep_name, a.stu_schyear, a.stu_semester, a.stu_dep, b.mem_reg1, b.mem_sex, a.stu_record, b.mem_tel, b.mem_email, b.mem_email, b.mem_postnum, b.mem_addr1, b.mem_addr2, b.mem_bank, b.mem_depo, b.mem_banknum, d.col_name, b.mem_photopath, b.mem_pass from student a, member b, department c, college d where smem_no = #{smem_no} and a.smem_no = b.mem_no and a.dep_code = c.dep_code and c.col_code = d.col_code

select rcrda_startyear, rcrda_startsemester,rcrda_endyear, rcrda_endsemester, rcrda_start, rcrda_reason, rcrda_state, rcrda_reject,rcrda_record from record_apply where smem_no = #{smem_no} order by rcrda_start desc
mapper.update: update member set mem_photopath = #{mem_photopath} where mem_no = #{mem_no}
